Title: ICurdSvc
Context:
public interface ICrudSvc<TEntity> : IBaseService
{
Task<ApiResponse<bool>> DeleteAsync<TDeleteReq>(TDeleteReq req);

Task<ApiResponse<bool>> DeleteAsync(TEntity entity);

Task<ApiResponse<TEntityOutput>> GetAsync<TEntityOutput>(object id)
where TEntityOutput : new();

Task<ApiResponse<TEntity>> GetAsync(object id);

Task<ApiResponse<PageOutPut<List<TGetListPagedOutput>>>> GetListPagedAsync<TGetListPageReq, TGetListPagedOutput>(TGetListPageReq req)
where TGetListPageReq : PageRepoReq
where TGetListPagedOutput : new();

Task<ApiResponse<PageOutPut<List<TEntity>>>> GetListPagedAsync<TGetListPageReq>(TGetListPageReq req)
where TGetListPageReq : PageRepoReq;

Task<ApiResponse<bool>> InsertAsync<TInsertReq>(TInsertReq req);

Task<ApiResponse<bool>> InsertAsync(TEntity entity);

Task<ApiResponse<bool>> UpdateAsync<TUpdateReq>(TUpdateReq req);

Task<ApiResponse<bool>> UpdateAsync(TEntity entity);
}
